resources.string:
1. Are you exhibiting 2 or more symptoms that are listed below?
 - Fever
 - Chill
 - Runny Nose
 - Fatigue
 - Nausea
 - Headache
2. Have you attended any event/areas associated with known COVID-19 cluster?
3. Have you travelled abroad within the last 14 days?
4. Have you had close contact with any confirmed or suspected COVID-19 cases within the last 14 days?
5. Are you a MOH COVID-19 volunteer in the last 14 days?
